definition: lacking taste or flavor or tang, a suite of rooms usually on one floor of an apartment house, in a forthright manner
details:
adjective
- lacking taste or flavor or tang
= synonyms: bland, insipid, vapid, flavorless, flavourless, savorless, savourless
- flattened laterally along the whole length (e.g., certain leafstalks or flatfishes)
= synonyms: compressed
- commercially inactive
= example: commercially inactive
- not reflecting light
= synonyms: matted, mat, matt, matte
- having a relatively broad surface in relation to depth or thickness
= example: having a relatively broad surface in relation to depth or thickness
- lacking the expected range or depth
= synonyms: two-dimensional
- having a surface without slope, tilt in which no part is higher or lower than another
= example: having a surface without slope, tilt in which no part is higher or lower than another
= synonyms: level, plane
- lacking contrast or shading between tones
- horizontally level
= example: horizontally level
- stretched out and lying at full length along the ground
= example: stretched out and lying at full length along the ground
= synonyms: prostrate
- sounded or spoken in a tone unvarying in pitch
= synonyms: monotonous, monotone, monotonic
- (of a musical note) lowered in pitch by one chromatic semitone
- not modified or restricted by reservations
= synonyms: unconditional, categoric, categorical
- having lost effervescence
= example: having lost effervescence
- lacking stimulating characteristics
= synonyms: bland
noun
- a suite of rooms usually on one floor of an apartment house
= synonyms: apartment
- scenery consisting of a wooden frame covered with painted canvas
- a deflated pneumatic tire
= synonyms: flat tire
- a shallow box in which seedlings are started
- freight car without permanent sides or roof
= synonyms: flatbed, flatcar
- a musical notation indicating one half step lower than the note named
- a level tract of land
= example: a level tract of land
adverb
- in a forthright manner
= synonyms: straight
- with flat sails
= example: with flat sails
